author: Special Correspondent
title: Special Officer takes stock of food supply
description: Special Officer for anti-COVID19 operations in the district M. Karunakaran on Wednesday directed officials to ensure sufficient stock of essential commodities and meticulous and speedy distribution to
content:
Special Officer for anti-COVID19 operations in the district M. Karunakaran on Wednesday directed officials to ensure sufficient stock of essential commodities and meticulous and speedy distribution to beneficiaries.
